tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I was having a lot of trouble with one of my molars and had to do a root canal treatment. Even after the treatment it was too painful but after the proper medication and fitting the crown it feels like natural tooth. She is friendly and explains things in simple terms.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: We visited the Doctor, she explained things in details and was very concerned.surely we would recommend the other patients to visit this Doctor.

Hi folks! Visited Dr.Tasmiya with issues related to a wisdom tooth. I must say she was an easy going person from day 1 providing adequate info about the dental issue.
I had a complicated surgery but well managed by her team.
reply_text: Thank u for ur valuable feedback

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: She is really friendly and explains the issue properly in a lay man's term, she even suggests proper course of action and we can reach her out over call for follow up. I went there for a RCT gone wrong which was done somewhere else and I am really happy and satisfied after getting it corrected by her.
